DataElement.preferredName: Image Positive Finding Previous Exam Number Code
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A numeric code indicating if the current observation confirming the presence of a disease/condition occurred prior to the current evaluation on a previous image study. [Manually-curated]

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An observation confirming something, such as the presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism occurring prior to the current evaluation of a patient's condition. [Manually-curated]

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition:
Any record of an imaging event whether physical or electronic.:An observation confirming something, such as the
presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism.

Concepts.definition: Any record of an imaging event whether physical or electronic.
A finding of abnormality following an examination or observation confirming something, such as the presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurring prior to something else.:An appraisal or evaluation of a patient's condition by a physician or registered nurse, based on clinical and laboratory data, medical history, and the patient's account of symptoms.  2. The process by which a patient's condition is appraised or evaluated. (Taber's)

Concepts.definition: An appraisal or evaluation of a patient's condition by a clinician that is based on a physical exam, medical history, and the patient's account of symptoms.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
ConceptualDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine

DataElementConcept.origin: ACRIN:American College of Radiology Imaging Network
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 11/6/12 jc Released, change to ACRIN context; associate with Image Finding CSI; remove from caBIG ACRIN CSI.  3/26/07 - Created to support ACRIN Breast CDE development task.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A numeric code indicating if the current  "lesion" has been seen on a previous image study.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Updated to add NCIt concept relationship. Updated VM Short Name to be the Public ID to be consistent with current convention for VM Short Name - DW 10-03-2022
ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
ConceptualDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

Concepts.definition: A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

ValueDomain.origin: ACRIN:American College of Radiology Imaging Network
ValueDomain.changeDescription: 11/6/12 jc Release, change to ACRIN context; associate with Image Finding CSI; remove from caBIG ACRIN CSI. 3/26/07 - Created to support ACRIN Breast CDE development task.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Was this "lesion" seen on a p
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was this "lesion" seen on a previous sonogram including any sonograms performed prior to study enrollment?
